author: Theresa Waldrop
title: New York City police department has lost 29 members to Covid-19
description: The New York Police Department said it has lost another member to Covid-19, bringing the total number of virus-related NYPD deaths to 29.
content:
(CNN)The New York Police Department said it has lost another member to Covid-19, bringing the total number of virus-related NYPD deaths to 29.
"I'm saddened to announce the passing of another beloved member of our NYPD family, Traffic Enforcement Agent Jason… [+2126 chars]
